meanings.definition: A road junction designed in the form of a four-leaf clover, with ramps allowing traffic to flow in all directions.
meanings.sent1: The cloverleafs near our town make it easy to switch highways.
meanings.sent2: We drove through multiple cloverleafs on our road trip.
meanings.sent3: The cloverleafs looked like giant green flowers from above.
meanings.sent4: Navigating through the cloverleafs felt like dancing on a complex pattern.
meanings.sent5: The cloverleafs intertwined seamlessly, guiding cars smoothly.

meanings.definition: The plural form of cloverleaf, referring to multiple road junctions designed in the form of a four-leaf clover.
meanings.sent1: We passed by several cloverleafs on our way to the city.
meanings.sent2: The cloverleafs in this area help manage traffic flow efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The cloverleafs seemed to multiply overnight, creating a maze of roads.
meanings.sent4: The cloverleafs dotted the landscape like intricate puzzles waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The cloverleafs connected roads like a network of green veins on a leaf.
